short.ar: يضيف مفتاح تبديل لاستخدام تخطيط الشبكة في Google Meets و Hold Spacebar للتحدث
short.am,bg,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Arrange Google Meets participants in grid layout and Hold Space bar to unmute while you talk, 100% working
short.bn: গুগল মিটসে গ্রিড লেআউট ব্যবহার করার জন্য টগল যুক্ত করে এবং কথা বলার জন্য স্পেসবারটি ধরে রাখুন
short.ca: Afegeix un commutador per utilitzar un disseny de quadrícula a Google Meets i mantén premuda la barra espaiadora per parlar
short.da: Tilføjer et skifte for at bruge et gitterlayout i Google Meets og Hold mellemrumstasten for at tale
short.de: Fügt einen Umschalter hinzu, um ein Rasterlayout in Google Meets zu verwenden, und hält die Leertaste gedrückt, um zu sprechen
short.es: Agrega una palanca para usar un diseño de cuadrícula en Google Meets y mantén presionada la barra espaciadora para hablar
short.fr: Ajoute une bascule pour utiliser une disposition de grille dans Google Meets et maintenez la barre d'espace pour parler
short.hi: Google मीट में ग्रिड लेआउट का उपयोग करने के लिए एक टॉगल जोड़ता है और बात करने के लिए स्पेसबार को पकड़ें
short.hr: Dodaje prekidač za upotrebu rasporeda mreže u Google Meets i držite razmaknicu za razgovor
short.id: Menambahkan sakelar untuk menggunakan tata letak kisi di Google Bertemu dan Tahan Spasi untuk berbicara
short.it: Aggiunge un interruttore per utilizzare un layout a griglia in Google Meets e tenere premuta la barra spaziatrice per parlare
short.ja: Google Meets and HoldSpacebarのグリッドレイアウトを使用して会話するためのトグルを追加します
short.nl: Voegt een schakelaar toe om een rasterlay-out te gebruiken in Google Meets en houdt de spatiebalk ingedrukt om te praten
short.pl: Dodaje przełącznik służący do używania układu siatki w Google Spotyka się i przytrzymaj spację, aby mówić
short.pt_BR: Adiciona um botão de alternância para usar um layout de grade no Google Meets e mantenha a barra de espaço para falar
short.ru: Добавляет переключатель для использования макета сетки в Google Meets и удерживайте клавишу пробела для разговора
short.sv: Lägger till en växling för att använda en rutnätlayout i Google Meets och Hold Mellanslag för att prata
short.uk: Додає перемикач для використання макета сітки в Google Meets та утримання пробілу для розмови
short.zh_CN: 添加一个切换开关，以使用Google Meets and Hold Spacebar中的网格布局进行交谈
short.zh_TW: 添加一個切換開關，以使用Google Meets and Hold Spacebar中的網格佈局進行交談

long.ar,bn,ca,da,de,es,fr,hi,hr,id,it,ja,nl,p:
Arrange Google Meets participants in grid layout and Hold Space bar to unmute while you talk, 100% working
Google Meet Grid View and Push to Talk is a simple but powerful extension that adds a toggle to use grid view in a Google Meet meeting. During the meeting, on a video call it provides a great user experience.

It’s very easy to use the google meet grid view as an extension icon will be added at the top-right corner in address bar.

With the help of this extension, all the Google Meet participants can be seen simultaneously without having any primary speaker to make the interaction hassle-free. Also, you will not face any issues even in large meetings.

This Google Meet extension is better than other Google grid view extensions as it comes with more advanced features and looks to enhance the meeting experience. 

It includes a better layout and now you can press the space bar to un-mute the mic and release to mute it back.

Here are the highlights of Google Meet grid view
1 Adds a button to use a grid layout in Google Meet.
2 Well optimised and enhanced grid view layout during Google Meet calls. Its 100% working and free of bugs.
3 Simply press and hold the space bar to un-mute the mic when you want to speak and release it to mute it again.

We are working on it to make Google Meet grid view and Push to talk extension better for you.
